sections.description: TZ Plus Gallery - Display WordPress albums, social gallery like Facebook, Flickr, Instagram and Google+.
sections.installation:
1. Login to your website and go to the Plugins.
  2. Click the Add New button.
  3. Under Install Plugins, click the Upload Plugin.
  4. Select the plugin zip file (tz-plus-gallery.zip) from your computer then click the Install Now button.
  5. You should see a message stating that the plugin was installed successfully.
  6. Click the Activate Plugin.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.1.2

  1. Support WordPress Albums.
  2. Fixed Conflict with Bootstrap menu in mobile layout.
  3. Fixed load photo when click to albums.
